tasks.label: Deploy epaper to Google Cloud Functions
Run epaper locally with env vars
tasks.command: lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="/Users/ramon.arellano/Documents/Github/google-service-account/kitche-epaper-renderer-83308b27697a.json" && export CALENDAR_ID=48otkcqvhjlqlogfkgic7labis@group.calendar.google.com && export YR_LAT=59.91 && export YR_LON=10.75 && export SECRET_NAME=projects/14548432634/secrets/kitchen-epaper-renderer-google-calendar-secret && functions-framework --target=epaper      gcloud functions deploy epaper --runtime=python310 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point=epaper --region=europe-north1 --set-env-vars=CALENDAR_ID=48otkcqvhjlqlogfkgic7labis@group.calendar.google.com,YR_LAT=59.91,YR_LON=10.75,SECRET_NAME=projects/14548432634/secrets/kitchen-epaper-renderer-google-calendar-secret --port=8080
